title: Bowl
marks:
Inscription

on underside, in blue: three-charac
description: rather shallow bowl on wide ring foot; vertical fluting around wall of bowl; interior decorated with central blue foliate rondel and six alternating sections of two designs--blue dots with red cross-hatching and red and orange organic foliate pattern behind dots, and branch with gilt and orange flowers topped with blue organic border pattern; exterior decorated with orange and blue flowers
